title: 美國正式宣佈對台軍售 涉及3項武器 包括射程300公里的地對地戰術飛彈及射程270公里的空射攻陸飛彈

replies.msg:
­­­WASHINGTON, October 21, 2020 - The State Department has made a determination approving a possible Foreign Military Sale to the Taipei Economic and Cultural Representative Office in the United States (TECRO) of one hundred thirty-five (135) AGM-84H Standoff Land Attack Missile Expanded Response (SLAM-ER) Missiles and related equipment for an estimated cost of $1.008 billion.
（AGM-84H SLAM-ER遠距攻陸飛彈135枚，價值10億美元）
...

WASHINGTON, October 21, 2020 - The State Department has made a determination approving a possible Foreign Military Sale to the Taipei Economic and Cultural Representative Office in the United States (TECRO) of eleven (11) High Mobility Artillery Rocket Systems (HIMARS) M142 Launchers and related equipment for an estimated cost of $436.1 million....(11) High Mobility Artillery Rocket Systems (HIMARS) M142 Launchers; sixty-four (64) Army Tactical Missile Systems (ATACMS) M57 Unitary Missiles
（M142 HIMARS機動火箭炮發射車11輛，M57陸軍地對地戰術飛彈64枚，價值4.36億美元）
...

­­­WASHINGTON, October 21, 2020 - The State Department has made a determination approving a possible Foreign Military Sale to the Taipei Economic and Cultural Representative Office in the United States (TECRO) of six (6) MS-110 Recce Pods and related equipment for an estimated cost of $367.2 million.
（MS110偵照筴艙6具，價值3.67億美元）

Source:（香港網友需翻牆才能觀看）
https://www.dsca.mil/press-media/major-arms-sales/taipei-economic-and-cultural-representative-office-united-states-16
